translations: v.对……进行人口调查；统计……的数目

phrs.translation: 人口统计局，人口调查局；人口普查局

sentences.sentence: Of these, 40% told census-takers they were Muslims.
sentences.translation: 这些人当中，有40%的人告诉人口普查员说他们是穆斯林。

sentences.sentence: The detailed assessment of the latest census will be ready in three months.
sentences.translation: 有关最新人口普查的详细评估工作将在3个月内就绪。

sentences.sentence: Census data has shown Australians come from more than 200 countries.
sentences.translation: 人口普查数据显示，澳大利亚人来自200多个国家。
